text: egha kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Nɨ oragh! Nɨ uan ifongiamɨn gɨn ghua, arazir kɨ ifongeziba ko nan Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavim abigha, nan Akar Gavgavimɨn gɨn zuir puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ kamaghɨn nɨghnigha gɨvagha ghaze, nɨ atrivir ingangarimɨn gɨvagh, ua kantrin kamɨn ganan kogham. Kɨ nɨn ingangarir gumazitam amɨseveghtɨma an atrivimɨn otivam.
